reviewerName: Lisa R. Taylor "Lisa R Taylor, Author"
reviewtext: I read the reviews and quite frankly; I'm baffled. Though some of the reviews gave this light a bad review; I'm not. This is a great light, it picks up the slightest movement and that is EXACTLY what I needed. The span of it was surprisingly wide and on cue when tested. If you need a cheap but good light, this is it.
